SELECT a.SYSTEM_CODE AS "systemCode", a.TABLE_CODE AS "tableCode", a.FIELD_CODE AS "fieldCode", a.UPDATE_TYPE AS "updateType", a.OLD_CONTENT AS "oldContent", a.NEW_CONTENT AS "newContent" FROM mu_order_temp a
a.table_code = #{tableCode}

select a.SYSTEM_CODE AS "systemCode", a.TABLE_CODE AS "tableCode", a.FIELD_CODE AS "fieldCode", a.UPDATE_TYPE AS "updateType", a.OLD_CONTENT AS "oldContent", a.NEW_CONTENT AS "newContent" from mu_order_temp a where a.CREATE_TIME in ( select MAX(b.CREATE_TIME) from mu_order_temp b where b.table_code = #{tableCode} GROUP BY b.FIELD_CODE)
select a.ORDER_ID from mu_order a where a.CREATE_TIME in ( select MAX(b.CREATE_TIME) from mu_order b where b.DB_CODE = #{dbCode})

select a.SYSTEM_CODE AS "systemCode", a.TABLE_CODE AS "tableCode", a.FIELD_CODE AS "fieldCode", a.UPDATE_TYPE AS "updateType", a.OLD_CONTENT AS "oldContent", a.NEW_CONTENT AS "newContent", a.CREATE_TIME AS "createDate", a.ORDER_ID AS "orderId", b.EXECUTOR AS "order.EXECUTOR", b.CHANGER AS "order.CHANGER" from mu_order_infro a left join mu_order b on b.order_id = a.order_id where a.order_id = #{orderId}

select a.ORDER_SCRIPT_ID AS "orderScriptId", a.TABLE_CODE AS "tableCode", a.EXE_STR AS "exeStr", a.SCRIP_TYPE AS "scripType", a.ORDER_ID AS "orderId", a.CREATE_TIME AS "createDate" from mu_order_script a where a.order_id = #{orderId}
